Constraining text generation to existing strings enables extraction

Last updated on May 14, 2021

If the output of a text generation model is constrained to a handful of existing strings, say knowledge base items, then it can be used for extraction. This is because the model is forced into generating explicit items from a list, in a context-dependent way.

Resources

  • https://arxiv.org/abs/2010.00904
